message: Millions of women have zero say in terms of regulating their own reproductive lives, including using birth control. Countless men won't use condoms, and the availablility of health care for women is grim. Birth control is great, but there is so much more attached to this issue. When men are the ones who decide when sexual contact happens ( which is usually going to involve intercourse ), and decide on whether children will be part of the equation, and how many, it's a bigger conversation than only talking about birth control.
